ai-tha-ap163:1.1_0: ° and said: “This is the name Padumavatī.
ai-tha-ap163:1.2_0: the Lord of Men, the Lord of Men,
ai-tha-ap163:2.2_0: not far from the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap163:2.4_0: being guarded, they instantly drawn out.
ai-tha-ap163:3.4_0: set out the water for washing.
ai-tha-ap163:4.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap163:5.1_0: if you associate with your eons;
ai-tha-ap163:5.2_0: My hair was decorated with jewels,
ai-tha-ap163:6.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap163:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Suppiya.
ai-tha-ap163:8.1_0: first Elder Suppiyā’s teacher lady first,
